scripts.build: npm run sync-images && astro build && npm run remove-videos-from-dist
scripts.remove-videos-from-dist: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const videosDir = path.join('dist', 'images', 'videos'); if (fs.existsSync(videosDir)) { fs.rmSync(videosDir, { recursive: true, force: true }); console.log('Removed videos from dist/'); }"
